title: What are the best design blogs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of the Best Design Blogs i have discovered and i would love to share with you all. ArchDaily  http://www.archdaily.com/Architecture News: The latest buildings, projects and competitions every day INHABITAT http://inhabitat.com/Future-forward design for the world you inhabit Core77 http://www.core77.com/Design news, culture, events and resources. A daily must-read for designers world wide.	  Designboom http://www.designboom.com/ Toxel http://toxel.com Design Ideas and Tech Concepts Smashing Magazine http://www.smashingmagazine.com/ Information Is Beautiful http://www.informationisbeautiful.net/ Apartment Therapy Main http://www.apartmenttherapy.com/  MoCoLoco http://mocoloco.com/ Swissmiss  http://www.swiss-miss.com/ Dezeen http://www.dezeen.com/ Photoflavor http://www.photoflavor.com/ Design*Sponge  http://www.designsponge.com/ NOTCOT.ORG  http://www.notcot.org/ Greyscalegorilla http://gsgphotos.posterous.com/ Yanko Design  http://www.yankodesign.com/ WebUrbanist  http://weburbanist.com/ Art Lebedev Studio http://store.artlebedev.com/ c h r o m a s i a  http://www.chromasia.com/ Cool Hunting http://www.coolhunting.com/ Deceptive Media http://www.deceptivemedia.co.uk/ Decor8 decor8blog.com Havana Club http://www.havana-club.com/ Home Sweet Home http://sweethomestyle.tumblr.com/ For more interesting Design Blogs, you may follow Design Folders of the following people Sergio Montefusco  http://feedspot.com/u/583a3a6d19d7260094c0035d88726d62Michele Federico  http://feedspot.com/u/008924fc489ecad72d1f78da86cd0c0eShawn Scott  http://feedspot.com/u/ab6a7888189e52f4b60b438ddeb9f276Christopher Ueda  http://feedspot.com/u/1a357ca34f9d0ce37c9398a614b10966Harith http://feedspot.com/u/99ca4dd3e85f7f1244c24c4a31d5a20fLeyan Lo  http://feedspot.com/u/c5a023b3b78ba9a6fa90bee4fd9d0249Becky Boutwell  http://feedspot.com/u/95dac086501088a8ab8743158b7a1af8 Hope this is helpful!

Here is a list of UX Design Blogs and Resource Websites for reference, and I just picked some of them. Hope that’s helpful. No.1. Smashing Magazine A comprehensive website provides high-quality articles with the UX employee on Design, Coding, Mobile, and Word Press etc. No. 2. UXbooth A professional UX website. The difference between it and Smashing Magazine is that Uxbooth focuses more on the aspect of user experience design. No.3: UX Magazine Articles are short and forceful with popular design case to explain the theoretical knowledge, and inference in the articles are very convincing. No.4: Lukew Lukew, a senior UX expert, also the founder of several companies. No.5：Design Modo You can find lots of great articles on the category of “Design”, including UX design, Responsive design, Website design and App design. No.6: Web Designer Depot What attracts me on this website is it’s outstanding visual design. Subscribers can receive the ultramodern information on the visual design which deserves sustaining attention from visual designers. No. 7: Net Magazine Net is the online version of it’s entity magazine. Wide coverage of the article content is a big advantage for subscribers to expand horizon. No. 8: Mockplus Blog The interface of this blog is very simple and clean. Articles are all surrounding the topics of design tools, resources. All of the websites and blogs are in no particular order, just name and list them. Hope that’s helpful to you. :)
